111.content:
Naruto casted a genjutsu on Sasuke. "Alright slave, here's your only command and you must obey it.

What is it master?" Sasuke monotony asked.

"I command to to eat like crazy until your as fat as a sumo."

111.title: Weight Gain

1111.content:
For the past month, all Sasuke wanted to do was eat...and eat...Naruto looked on in happiness as his Sasuke grew bigger and bigger, eating whatever he put in front of him. After only three days he didn't fit in anything and Naruto had to buy him a sweat-suit. At this point, he barely even fit in that, his body bulging and swaying whenever he moved.

He currently weighed 289 pounds. That by itself wasn't very big, but it meant that, soon, he would be nice and barely able to move.

Not that Sasuke noticed. All he could think of was gaining weight. He hadn't even left the old compound in a month. Naruto had convinced Tsunade and Kakashi that Sasuke needed some time to himself.

Today, a month since being caught in Naruto's genjutsu, Sasuke was in his living room, eating from a bowl of chips as Naruto prepared his dinner.

'Dinner's ready," Naruto said as he entered the room and went to Sasuke's side, taking the bowl from him and helping him to his feet. Sasuke had gotten so fat so fast that he was having trouble with his balance. His shirt was too small and rode up his large, milky belly.

"What's for dinner?"

"Smoked pork and chocolate cake for you," Naruto said as he helped Sasuke into his seat. Sasuke immediantly dug into the pork while Naruto picked at his ramen. He could never take his eyes off of Sasuke when he ate. He was so absorbed in the beautiful site before him that he nearly jumped when he heard a knock at the door. Who could it be?

112.content:
Naruto did not like Sasuke. This was a fact neither of them could ignore. However, it wasn't really that Naruto didn't like Sasuke, it was more that he just didn't like his attitude. If only Sasuke could be nicer and more agreeable? Which, was where Naruto had gotten his current idea. He had spent weeks looking through scroll after scroll to find just the right one to "fix" Sasuke and now that he was sure he had "just the thing", he was excited to use it.

It was surprisingly easy to break into Sasuke's house. It was even easier to find the milk and add the sleeping drugs which, if Sasuke followed his schedule, he would ingest at 6:45pm and pass out 10 minutes later. And then, Naruto thought with glee, would the fun begin...

He stayed close to Sasuke's house, but not too close. What fun would it be if Sasuke found him? So, he waited until 7pm, when he knocked on the door. He knocked again and with still no word, he let himself in. Sasuke was on his couch, an empty glass of milk on the floor. He was asleep, his breathing peaceful and sound.Naruto quickly picked him up and carried him to his bedroom, as told to do by the instructions on the scroll, which called for the "victim" to be placed on a soft, comfortable surface. He gently laid Sasuke on his bed, careful not to wake him. Naruto then lifted his shirt and made the appropriate seals on his lower-belly before making a small seal on his forehead.

Naruto could hardly contain his excitement, but, he told himself, he wanted to see this through and see what it would do to humble Sasuke. And so, finally, he performed the hands.

The seals on Sasuke's stomach and forehead glowed with a bright, green light. Sasuke groaned, his body shaking, his back arching. Naruto thought he heard a loud snap! as Sasuke's body gave a large jolt, then another and a another. For a moment, Naruto grew afraid that this would kill Sasuke-

Sasuke's body stopped shaking and fell back to the bed, his head rolling to his side. He groaned, his hands twitching slightly before rising to rub his belly where the seal had been. Naruto looked closely, now aware that both seals had disappeared. However, he was far more afraid of the way Sasuke was rubbing his belly. Was he awake? Suddenly, Sasuke moaned again, his facing contorting in pain as his...

Naruto gasped. Sasuke's belly was rising, was getting bigger and bigger...Finally, it stopped. During the expansion, Sasuke seemed have loosened his pants to accommodate the mass; it looked like a flesh colored ball. Naruto gulped, unsure of what to do...

Whether it had been by design or sheer dumb luck, Naruto had restrained Sasuke in such a way that the last loyal Uchiha could not perform the rope-escape jutsu.

The ropes were too thick, too strong, for Sasuke to brute force his way out, and his bonds were too tight, too restricting for him to wriggle out. His hands were tied at his sides, kept well apart to prevent him from forming handseals. There was no way for Sasuke to escape his current predicament save by the mercy of his captor, and that frustrated him.

The night was cold. Naruto wouldn't like it if she let one of his friends freeze.

He filled the tea kettle with water and place it on the stove.

"Itachi."

12.title: Orochimaru

121.content:
After six months of intense training, Orochimaru had realized that Sasuke would never be as useful as he had thought. Whether this was because it was impossible to please him or because Sasuke really wasn't as strong as he thought he was was debated extensively by Orochimaru and Kabuto, who saw the whole thing as a waste of resources. But Orochimaru got what he wanted, no matter how ridiculous the request. And with that in mind, Kabuto kept his mouth shut as he sent another burst of chakra into Sasuke's brain. Small twitches and convulsions wracked Sasuke's body, so much so that he had to be restrained.
"Uhgg...," Sasuke's brows furrowed together, sweat dripping down his bare skin.

Kabuto sighed, caressing Sasuke's brow until he relaxed again. While he didn't quite agree with what Orochimaru was doing, when the time came for him to take the body, none of this would be difficult to fix. Another burst of chakra and Sasuke began to groan, trying to twist out of the bonds that held him.

"Shhh, just a bit more to go."

After several more rounds, it was done. He injected Sasuke with a sedative before carrying him to his new room. The boy's body was deathly limp, yet surprisingly warm. His eyes were half-lidded, his throat making glutteral groans and moans. Kabuto hushed him, not wanting to awaken their master, who was sleeping not far down the hall. Finally they came to Sasuke's new room, located close to Orochimaru's quarters. Kabuto barely gave it a glance as he went to work dressing Sasuke in his new clothes and putting him in his new "bed". All the while, Sasuke was still and pliant. He sighed again when he was done and couldn't help but dread what would come in the morning...
121.title: Makes him a big baby?

Orochimaru woke the next morning, quickly got himself dressed and made his way down the hall to the next room where Sasuke was sleeping. Very quietly, Orochimaru peered through the door and into Sasuke's new 'nursery'. The room itself wasn't anything special, it looked like all the other rooms at the underground hideout, but Orochimaru had added some special furniture to this one. The room had a crib, a changing table, a highchair, a rocking chair, and a dresser. It had almost no decorations to speak of and all of the furniture in this room was notably bigger than it should have been, with the exception of the rocking chair and the dresser. This was because all of the furniture in the room had been custom built by Kabuto and Orochimaru specifically for Sasuke.

Orochimaru had decided that since Sasuke was never going to be as strong as they all thought he would be then there was no point in continuing his training. Kabuto told his master that Sasuke wouldn't stay if he found out that he wasn't going to be trained anymore and Orochimaru would lose his chance at obtaining Sasuke's Sharingan, so the pale skinned man came up with the plan to regress Sasuke and care for him until the time came to steal his body. He had always wanted a son and knew that he probably would never have one of his own, so this was the next best thing.

Orochimaru entered the room quietly and made his way over to the crib to check on the sleeping Uchiha. Sasuke was laying on his back in just a white shirt and a diaper that Kabuto had put on him the night before, a trail of drool was slowly making its way down the side of his mouth. The raven haired ninja had a stuffed snake wrapped tightly in his arms, it was one of the few toys that Orochimaru had placed in the room. Orochimaru wasn't surprised that Sasuke was still asleep, the ivory skinned Sanin had instructed Kabuto to give Sasuke a very strong sedative after he finished regression treatments so that he would sleep.

The regression treatments were only temporary and they would need to be redone every other week or so, but when they were at their strongest Sasuke's motor functions and speech capabilities were almost nonexistent and all of his memories of his life as an adult were completely repressed. He was one hundred percent dependent.

Orochimaru dropped the dirty diaper into the pail next to him and grabbed a fresh one from the stack of many under the changing table, fastening it around Sasuke's waist snugly.

Soon after being changed into a fresh diaper the Uchiha baby's eyes began to flutter open, sleep now escaping him. Sasuke's rubbed the sleep out of his eyes with balled up fists as he took in his surroundings. It wasn't long before big crocodile tears began falling down his cheeks as he cried, his pacifier now forgotten on the floor. Orochimaru quickly scooped Sasuke off of the changing table and started bouncing him on his hip, he shushed him quietly and whispered sweet nothings into his ear as he picked up his pacifier and replaced it in attempt to console him.
12121.title: Orochimaru checks Sasuke's diaper

121211.content:
Every time Orochimaru tried to give Sasuke his pacifier the ninja baby would -turn his head away and simply continue to cry. Nothing seemed to clam him down and the boys cries were only continued to get louder. Suddenly, the thought occurred to Orochimaru that Sasuke hadn't eaten in almost twenty four hours and it was then that he knew the reason for his waterworks.

"I bet daddy's little man is hungry." As if on cue, Kabuto entered the room holding a warm bottle of formula. It was a little concoction that the slate haired ninja had come up with at the request of Orochimaru. Since Sasuke wasn't going to be eating normal food anymore they needed to be certain that the body was going to stay in shape and in a healthy condition for when the time came for Orochimaru to take it over. Kabuto handed the bottle over to his master, who took it from him. Orochimaru was cradling Sasuke in the rocking chair already, the hand under him was softly patting his exposed diapered bottom as the other brought the nipple of the bottle up to the Uchiha boy's lips.

"I figured you might be needing that. I could hear the brat wailing all the way in my room." Kabuto complained as he watched as the raven haired boy sucked down his formula vigorously.

"I added some stool softeners to the first couple of batches of formula. They should help Sasuke's body adjust a little bit better to being incontinent." While Kabuto was explaining the formula to Orochimaru he opened up Sasuke's dresser to pulled out some clothes for the boy who was still in just a t-shirt and a diaper. The white haired man scoffed at all of the infantile clothes that had been stocked into the dresser. Kabuto pulled out a simple blue onesie to dress Sasuke in. Orochimaru pulled the bottle out of Sasuke's lips just long enough for Kabuto to pull the garment over his head, but not without protest from the boy. Sasuke didn't put up much fight as kabuto pulled his arms through the appropriate holes and snapped the crotch shut. Orochimaru placed the pacifier back in Sasuke's mouth after he had finished draining the last drops of the formula from the bottle.
121211.title: Sasuke's hungry

123.content:
Orochimaru looked at his to become her slave, Sasuke Uchiha as he then injected him with a serum that slowly changed him into a girl that took three days.

What changes first?
123.title: Sex Slave?

1231.content:
Sasuke screamed as he thrashed in his restraints. His bones felt as if they were tearing, pulling apart. Especially his hips! He screamed again and again, unable to stop. He was unaware of Orochimaru's smirking, of how the man looked at him as though he were the finest of fine meats. {Soon/i}, the man thought.

Now, what changes next?
1231.title: Body structure

12311.content:
Sasuke didn't know how long the pain lasted, but after how many hours he didn't know, it seemed to subside. He was able to drift off to sleep, but only for an hour, though it felt like a moment to him. And then came more pain, though this time it was, well, different. It burned, it stung, but the absolute woorst of it was just how it itched. But worst of all, it was inside of him. He gritted his teeth, praying that he could do it, that he could be strong.

Does Sasuke take the pain?
12311.title: His organs

choices: Hair color changes and grows out
123111.content: As he slept, holding in the pain for inside him. His legs became thinner and firmed with his skin lightly tanned with a smooth healthy tone. When he wakes up the next morning. . .
123111.title: Yes

1231111.content: His/her hair was down to his/her waist and was. . .
1231111.title: Hair color changes and grows out

123112.content:
He passed out, the pain all too much for him.

When does he next awaken?
123112.title: No

1231122.content: And what does he look like?
1231122.title: When the transformation is done?

12311222.content: When he awoke, the transformation was complete. His, well, now her hair reached to her back. Her breasts were still small, but the rest of her body fairly feminine. Does Sasuke notice the changes?
12311222.title: Something more elegant?

1231122211.content:
She smiled at her new shape. Lord Orochimaru was right, this was much better. She sat up in the large bed, looking around. The light of the room was dim and somber. The bed she laid on was huge, almost nine feet in length and width. It was covered in soft, red sheets and pillows, with a large canopy above. The rest of the room was simple, with stone walls and a wooden floor.

In the corner there was a dresser beside a wardrobe. Beside it was a door to what she supposed was the bathroom. In front of the bed was another, much larger door.

She snuggled back into the covers, still a little tired.

Does someone else enter?

Or is she alone for a while?
1231122211.title: No

13.content: And what does his sensei decide is best?
13.title: Kakashi

choices: Add another boy into the mix!
133.content: Wait, okay, do we want full on mpreg, or should Kakashi turn him into a girl?
133.title: Mpreg

choices: He leaves Sasuke as he is...for now...
1332.content:
Kakashi smirked victoriously as he looked down at Sasuke, who was gagged and hogtied at his feet. He'd finally managed to get the drop on the cocky boy wonder after years of searching for the boy.

Sasuke, glaring up at his perverted teacher, and struggled against his bonds, perhaps in an attempt to snap the ropes, or somehow slip them off. But his efforts were to no avail. As much as it galled Sasuke to even consider it, Kakashi had done a superb job of tying him up.

The ropes were too thick, too strong, for Sasuke to brute force his way out, and his bonds were too tight, too restricting for him to wriggle out. His hands were tied at his sides, kept well apart to prevent him from forming handseals. There was no way for Sasuke to escape his current predicament save by the mercy of his captor, and that frustrated him.

He glared daggers at kakashi.

"What do you want?" he demanded from where he lay hogtied at his feet.

Kakashi smirked.

"What do I think? Well, I think that someone needs a little bit of discipline."

"Leave me alone!"

"No, not this time. I can't let you go, Sasuke. I've been tasked by the village to bring you back-"

"I'm not going back!"

"Oh, I think you are."

Kakashi lightly kicked the boy over, giving him access to his stomach and forehead. Does Kakashi change Sasuke body, or mind?
1332.title: Mpreg!

choices: Ok, he turns into a girl
He uses a jutsu to impregnnte him
13321.content: What changes are made to his body?
13321.title: His body

choices: He is made to be submissive
13322.content: What changes are made to his mind?
13322.title: His mind

135.content:
For the Kakashi, the plan had been in place for a while. However, he had only decided to act on it recently, with "approval" from Tsunade, who wanted him to take Sasuke to a secluded cabin and work with him on his numerous "anger" issues. He smiled under his masked, thinking of just how he would be helping Sasuke. The boy in question was silent, as usual, though he had at first at least been somewhat surprised and angered at his normal routine being so tampered with.

"Are we there yet?" his first real words since they had left the village gates.
"Almost," Kakashi replied, "we should be there soon."

Another half hour went by before they reached their destination, a little cabin in a small clearing. Inside, it was even more simple, with just a small kitchen, two small beds, some light fixtures, a TV, and a small bathroom off to the side. Sasuke did not mind the simplicity, however; they were out here to train and did not need all the distractions of home. After setting his bag down and claiming his bed, Sasuke, a smile clear under his mask, turned to look at the boy, who was now sitting on the bed, ready to begin.

'Alright," he sat down on his own bed and faced the boy, "why don't we start with a little trust building, alright?" He took the small crystal from his pocket. "I want you to look at the crystal-"

"Are you going to hypnotize me or something?"

"Excuse me?" Kakashi asked, his voice not betraying the momentary panic he felt.

"There's no such thing as hypnosis," he said, rolling his eyes and crossing his arms.

"This isn't hypnosis, Sasuke. It's a trust building exercise. It's too teach you that it's alright to let other people do things for you, okay? I mean, wouldn't that be nice if you didn't have to do everything for yourself?"

"What do you mean? Isn't being independent what we should be? If something happens on a mission-"

"Yes, of course, but it's just as important to remember that it's okay to give up some control, isn't it?" Kakashi lifted up the crystal by the string and began to let it gently swing back and forth.

"This is stupid."

"Just watch the crystal, Sasuke. Isn't it pretty? You want to watch it."

"It's stupid," but he could see Sasuke's eyes following the crystal.

"No, it's a very pretty crystal. You want to watch the pretty crystal, don't you?"

"I-I guess..."

"Good. It's very taxing, to watch the crystal, Sasuke. You're feeling very tired..."

Sasuke nodded. He was feeling tired. They had been walking all day...and his training. And the crystal, so pretty, but, yes, watching it was very hard. He could feel his eye-lids getting heavier and heavier as the minutes passed...But he didn't want to sleep...But yes, he did...Kakashi's voice was so relaxing. So...nice...

Kakashi smiled as Sasuke fell to his side, his breathing even. He was asleep, completely at his disposal. He carefully righted his body into a more comfortable sleeping position.

"Sasuke, I am going to place headphones on your head. Do whatever the nice headphones tell you, okay? Feel whatever they tell you to feel."

"...headphones...nice..."

"Yes, the headphones are nice. They will make you feel wonderful," he said as he placed the headphones on his student's head gently before turning them on.

He smiled as he saw Sasuke face soften eve more. He had recorded the recording himself just for this little occasion. But now he had two hours to get everything ready for Sasuke's new life.
135.title: Make him his bitch(literally)

1352.content:
"You are a dog now."
I am a dog...
"You do not know how to speak, you cannot read or write or do math. You are a dumb dog."
I...am...dumb...
"You will defecate and urinate like a good dog, outside. If you do not, you will be punished like a dog..."
Punished...like...dog...
"You love your master."
I...love...master...


After an hour of preparing the cabin, he was ready. Kakashi looked to his student on the bed, his face peaceful, his body completely limp. Of course, every night Kakashi would have to give him the headphones, but only for a week, he decided. Soon, he knew, Sasuke would wake up and the "fun" would begin.

Slowly, Sasuke opened his eyes. He sat up and removed the headphones. He slowly slid off the bed and removed his shirt, shoes, pants, head-ban, and finally his underwear. All the while, his eyes were blank, glazed over and far away. Once the underwear was off, Sasuke seemed to trip, stumbling to his knees. For a moment, Kakshi was concerned.

"Sasuke?" he went over and bent down, touching his shoulder."Are you okay?"

Slowly, Sasuke turned his head, a smile spreading across his face.

Master

"Arf! Arf!" Sasuke licked and nuzzled his hand, leaning against his body.

"Good boy!" Kakashi petted his soft hair, rubbed behind his ears."What a good boy you are now! See Sasuke, isn't this better?"
1352.title: Sasuke submits

13522.content:
Sasuke barked again, wagging his butt and trying to paw and lick at Kakashi.

"Good puppy!"

Sasuke rolled onto his back, showing his master his naked belly. He panted as Kakashi rubbed his belly, happy to please. He righted himself, following Kakashi around the room as the man prepared to...
13522.title: Accept Your New Life

135222.content:
Sasuke barked and stayed close to Kakashi as the man filled his new food bowl. He knew Sasuke wouldn't live on real dog food, but he would do just fine on crumbled ration bars. As soon as he put the bowl on the ground the puppy nearly knocked him down to get to it.

"Good boy, Sasuke," Kakashi petted his back as food bits went everywhere due to his messy eating. Soon the bowl was empty, and Sasuke seemed ready for more. "No, Sasuke, no more. We don't want you getting fat."

What do they do next?
135222.title: Feed the Puppy
